testsuite.name: upei.project.GameTest
testsuite.system-out:
The Winner of the Game is Bob with 70 points! Congratulations!
Final Scores: - Alice: 50 points - Bob: 70 points - Charlie: 30 points Alice found a treasure worth 3 gems! Alice got 3 Rubies Alice discovered a Relic token.... ! 5 bonus points awarded. Alice encountered a trap: SNAKES! Venomous snakes slither in the darkness! Disaster! Alice was forced out of the cave and lost all their loot! Starting the game...
